Posts.Content: I'm sorry, this won't be helpful but I wanted you know you aren't alone. Mine is curly and thick,  it looks like an old lady perm or an afro. Actually today, I look like Nancy Reagan. I had such nice hair :(. I swear I looked better bald. But they say chemo curls last about a year. I just need to figure what to do with it till then! Good luck my friend :)
Posts.Title: hair regrowth after chemo
